data.name: How does a calculator work?
data.description:
A calulator follows the standard rules, multiply and divide, then add and subtract.

Please do not use the eval function! Do it yourself! It's also disabled.

Also new Function should not be used, try not to cheat and complete the task as asked!

This kata is simple, you take a string that contains numbers and special charactors and produces the result of the numbers.

e.g. 
```
calculator('1+1') -> 2

calculator('2+3+6+89+111+2') -> 213

calculator('1-1-9+20-99+10101') -> 10014
```

as you see it can have a few operations to get through and of course, multiplication and division go before add and subtract
```
calculator('104-2/2-5*20') -> 3

calculator('20-5*20+1+2/2-15+20*2-5/5') -> -54
```
